name: Jhothamia 6
overview: Published in Commodore Format 1993/08 (Issue #35). At last the holidays arrived and it was time to get away. You had heard of a spaceline which takes you on a tour around the solar system and decided that this was for you. Upon nearing the planet Jhothamia 6 the spaceship went out of control and began hurtling towards the planet. Luckily the automatic emergency crash landing system was working and you landed safely on the planet. Everyone else died and the ship was damaged. Now you must find a way off the planet and back to safety. You begin the adventure still inside the damaged spaceship.
